li.a: Pine River High School Hall of Fame Nomination Form

div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.h3: Welcome to Pine River Area Schools!

h3.em: Per the governor's Executive Order 2020-35, Pine River Area Schools is officially closed to face-to-face instruction for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. See the April 3 Web Release from Supt. Lukshaitis at the "News" section for more information.

br.h5: Don't forget to fill out your Census! It only takes a few minutes and it means federal money for our kids.

h3.a: Public Notice for 4.27.2020 Board of Education Workshop

div.p: Please click on this link https://5il.co/fkar to view the public notice and agenda for this Monday's 4.27.2020 Board of Education Workshop.
